option.DisplayText: Training point percentage per melee weapon hit
option.helptext:
Controls how much skill training that happens on each successful melee weapon hit.
The value is a percentage: ○ {{W|0}}: training disabled. ○ {{W|1}}: 0.01 points per hit. ○ {{W|10}}: 0.1 points per hit (default). ○ {{W|50}}: 0.5 points per hit. ○ {{W|100}}: 1 point per hit.
Affects skills: {{Y|Axe}}, {{Y|Cudgel}}, {{Y|Long Blade}}, {{Y|Short Blade}}, {{Y|Single Weapon Fighting}}, and {{Y|Multiweapon Fighting}} (doubled).
